title: GT launches Street Performer and blurs lines w/ Power Performer eMTBMX!
content:
BMX-style cruiser bikes have always encouraged fun, playful rides, but recently, the category has exploded, morphing into what are simply called ‘wheelie bikes’. Thanks to urban rideouts and social clips of riders keeping that front wheel up, wheelie bikes have become part of their own subculture and GT Bicycles has just taken their capabilities up […]

The post GT launches Street Performer and blurs lines w/ Power Performer eMTBMX! appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Steve Fisher
